name: quickstop
description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for workflow enhancement and productivity

plugins.name: arborist
plugins.description: Sync gitignored config files across git worktrees

plugins.name: muxy
plugins.description: Natural language tmux session management with templates

plugins.name: miser
plugins.description: Mise polyglot version manager integration for Claude Code

plugins.name: guilty-spark
plugins.description: Branch-aware documentation management for Claude Code projects

plugins.name: claudit
plugins.description: Audit and optimize Claude Code configurations with dynamic best-practice research
